div.p: Copyright Statement: These codes are excerpted from Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine (DICOM) Standard, Part 16: Content Mapping Resource, Copyright 2011 by the National Electrical Manufacturers Association
This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Include all codes defined in http://nema.org/dicom/dcid
